content:
Certainly, here is a table of keywords and definitions related to the Roman festival of Saturnalia:

| Keyword | Definition |
| --- | --- |
| Saturnalia | An ancient Roman festival held in December in honor of the god Saturn. |
| Saturn | The god honored during the Saturnalia festival. |
| Social norms | The usual rules and expectations of society. |
| Slaves | People who were owned by others and were forced to work for them. |
| Revelry | A time of joy, celebration, and partying. |
| Gift-giving | The exchange of small presents between people during the festival. |
| Decorations | Wreaths, garlands, and other items used to celebrate the festival. |
| Feasting | Eating lavish banquets and enjoying food and drink. |
| Merriment | Joy and happiness. |
| Community | A group of people living in a particular area and sharing common interests. |
